status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4cofo","text":"Linear tetra-ubiquitin fused to GST (GST-4xUb) was cloned into a pGEX-4T1 vector and is available from Addgene (RRID:Addgene #199779).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"esg3b","text":"After the transformation of the pGEX-4T1 vector encoding GST4xUb in E. coli Rosetta pLySS cells, grow cells in LB medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continued at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":68,"length":7},{"style":"sub","offset":137,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":124,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":170,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9a8kb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C93944801C7C11EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C672F8901C7C11EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bigld","text":"Once the cells reached an OD600 of 0.8, induce protein expression with   isopropyl β-D-1-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG) for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":28,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":122,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":127,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2sqq4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"E56926201C7C11EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"EAE4A7001C7C11EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"ECC5C3101C7C11EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"arurj","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation and resuspend in lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1et81","text":"Sonicate cell lysates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eam4n","text":"Clear lysates by centrifugation at   in a SORVAL RC6+ centrifuge with an F21S8x50Y rotor (Thermo Scientific).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"18000","duration":2700,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B2C26C801C7D11EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6nt2f","text":"Sonicate cell lysates for  . (1/2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4tk0o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"93FA05B01C7D11EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ce6c","text":"Sonicate cell lysates for  . (2/2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"983C8FBF1C7D11EE91900A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55ddq","text":"Collect the supernatant and incubate with preequilibrated Glutathione Sepharose 4B beads (GE Healthcare) for   at   with gentle shaking to bind GST-4xUb.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":109,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":114,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"C877FAE01C7D11EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CA29A2801C7D11EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"qr8e","text":"Centrifuge the samples to pellet the beads and remove the unbound lysate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"11cf7","text":"Wash the beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9fhqa","text":"Wash the beads twice with wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ed1f","text":"Wash the beads once with high salt wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8m6vk","text":"Wash the beads twice with wash buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1fti","text":"Incubate the beads   with   of   reduced glutathione dissolved in wash buffer at  , to elute GST-4xUb from the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":26,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":81,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"70E889E01C8511EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"7483B2001C8511EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"76D9D7001C8511EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"83B158901C8511EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8ep5n","text":"To collect the supernatant, collect the beads by centrifugation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5v3c","text":"Wash the beads twice with   of wash buffer, and collect the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ah6h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"4","error":false,"guid":"B30AC6801C8511EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2192s","text":"Pool the supernatant fractions, filter through a   syringe filter, concentrated\nwith 10 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore), and load onto a pre-equilibrated\nSuperdex 200 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"86pvn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"D39A31B01C8511EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"0.45"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6aekr","text":"Elute the proteins with SEC buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ap6s2","text":"Analyze the fractions by SDS-PAGE and Coomassie staining.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9slil","text":"Pool the fractions containing purified GST-4xUb.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7hqd","text":"After concentrating the purified protein, aliquot the protein and snap-freeze in liquid nitrogen. Store the proteins at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"640DDE901C8611EEA0BF1595443C67AD","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-80","unit":10}}}}

title: Purification of GST-tagged linear tetra-ubiquitin (4xUb)
